scripts.dev: concurrently -n "next,server,react,vue,svelte,angular" -c "blue,white,green,magenta,yellow,red" "next dev --turbopack" "PORT=5000 pnpm --filter @fortressauth/server dev" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-react dev" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-vue dev" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-svelte dev" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-angular dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "next,server,react,vue,svelte,angular" -c "blue,white,green,magenta,yellow,red" "next start" "PORT=5000 pnpm --filter @fortressauth/server start" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-react preview" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-vue preview" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-svelte preview" "pnpm --filter fortressauth-web-angular start"
